show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 73 Stephanie Race, demystifying science to help farmers to make better decisions
subtitle: 73 Stephanie Race, demystifying science to help farmers to make better decisions
summary:
An episode with Stephanie Race, founder and CEO of Crop Performance Ltd, which works with growers and food companies to improve productivity, conserve resources, and monitor the environmental impact of agriculture and food production on land and water use.

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.

Other ways to support our work:
- Share the podcast
- Give a 5-star rating
- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 

----------------------------------------------------------- 

Join me in this wide ranging interview with Stephanie who has been active in regenerative agriculture for over 10 years! With a team of 56, Crop Performance is trying to:

  • Translate science into practice growers and supply chain
  • Demystifying the science for the farmers
  • Yield limiting factors, growers need more tools in their toolkit 


www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2020/02/20/stephanie-race.
